com.atc.simulator.display.view.vector_text

Class HersheyFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.display.view.vector_text.HersheyFont

  • public class HersheyFont
extends java.lang.Object
    A single line font which can be rendered using opengl lines as libgdx 3d models. Useful resources: http://www.astro.caltech.edu/~tjp/pgplot/hershey.html http://paulbourke.net/dataformats/hershey/ Data source from: https://github.com/scruss/python-hershey License is also there.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HersheyFont.CharacterSet
      Types of character sets available to load.
      private class  HersheyFont.SimplexIndex
      Class definition for use by gson to load the index mapping hershey codes to ascii codes for the simplex character set.
